desc: Focused on rapidly developing smart, integrated lighting products and solutions using Corning® Fibrance® Light-Diffusing Fiber technology.

layout.text:
Flexible & Small Form Factor
Bend, curve, and wrap it, while maintaining vibrant and uniform light.

Ultra Bright & Uniform Light
Long strands of multi-color lighting in places that otherwise would not have been possible.

Integrated Light Solutions
Lasers, fiber, electronics, and accessories that work seamlessly together.

Portable & Rechargeable Solutions
Rechargeable battery and Bluetooth solutions to go where you go.
